function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 from real-life subjects involved in wearable technology experiments.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for individuals participating in the experiments and those in close contact with them.","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, including regular testing, quarantine protocols, and adherence to safety guidelines.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and self-monitoring wearables.","People":"Real-life subjects participating in experiments, researchers, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare facilities, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Data charting and collection involving multiple individuals in close contact.","Impact":"Increased risk of data contamination and potential spread of infection among those involved in data collection.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data collection protocols, including hygiene measures, distancing, and use of protective equipment.","Technologies":"Digital data collection tools, remote data capture methods, and secure online platforms.","People":"Researchers, data collectors, and study participants.","Owner":"Research institutions, data collection teams, and study coordinators."},{"Description":"Potential inaccuracies in early detection of COVID-19 using wearable technology.","Impact":"Misidentification of infected individuals leading to delayed treatment and further transmission of the virus.","Mitigation":"Regular validation and calibration of wearable technology, in conjunction with traditional testing methods and clinical assessment.","Technologies":"Biometric sensors, AI algorithms, and cloud-based data analytics.","People":"Study participants, healthcare professionals, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Manufacturers, researchers, and healthcare institutions."}]}
